column2: "Wow! That one was really big, but they still managed to wipe it out."
"They've all been wiped out, huh? They're putting up a bigger fight than I thought they would. Amazing! So amazing!"
"Well then, hopefully they've got a whooole bunch more amazing things to show us."
"If they don't, this'll turn out to be really boring, wouldn't it?"
"There's more of them...! Mr. Kotoshiro, you should run and--"
"It is my duty as a guard to protect my Lady's shrine. You two are the ones who should flee!"
"Mm-mm... We wouldn't even if you told us to... Right?"
"Well then, shall we..."

"...start round two?
...Er, hm? Huh?"
"This is... Ashen Wind!"
"...Goodness, all this unrest is rather disruptive to mine peaceful slumber."
"The obstinacy with which the Shironians and Kuronites ceaselessly quarrel is truly unto its own. 'Tis so disappointing as to be worthy of applause."
"Aaaah.. I say, there art many gathered unto this place. Is it thine intent to hold a banquet?"
"Alas, mine mood is ill suited for such festivities. Revise thy schedule."
"That huge army... just vanished? Dark Falz and all..."
"Hoho! 'Tis not that they vanished. They were merely sent out forthwith. Indeed, I should wager they art now deep within Kuron."
"Kotoshiro, O Kotoshiro. Why didst thy foolish self not flee?"
"While mayhaps I could understand wert thou alone, 'tis utterly foolish to involve mine guests."
"...I have no excuses."
"Hmph! How mundane. Raise at least some objection."
"Then, if I may, I must implore my Lady to return at once. What would we do without the shrine?"
"Hoho! That is thine objection? Kotoshiro, prepare to be punched."
"And so I shall steel myself."
"Dost thou fear mine fists?"
"They can destroy entire planets, so I certainly do."
"Thou shan't jest. I like this planet, and I am not wont to destroy things I like."
"However, Kotoshiro, you do have mine thanks for protecting the shrine."
"Oh, but of course. I must needs extend mine thanks to the guests."

"Many thanks to thee, <%me>,
and Matoi."
"Huh? How do you know our names...?"
"Hoho! I am privy to that much. I am the Miko of this shrine, after all."
"Once again, dear guests, mine deepest thanks."
"I am Sukuna-hime. I am known as the Ashen Miko. I am pleased to meet thee."
"Ashen Miko, Lady Sukuna-hime... O-On the contrary, the pleasure is ours."
"Hoho! Thou needn't be so formal. I am in thy debt. Wouldn'st thou agree, Kotoshiro?"
"...You have my thanks as well. Thanks to you, we were able to protect this land."
"Well, I do believe I shall return to my slumber in the selfsame shrine which thee and thine protected."
"Please wait, Lady Sukuna-hime! All of Harkotan is beset with quarreling--"
"I will not wait. I am beset with fatigue. And so I shall slumber forthwith."
"...I regret that you had to see that."
"Oh, d-don't worry about it."
"...You've got it rough, huh."
"That's... Miko-sama?"
"...I appreciate your understanding."
"I understand what you want to say, but I ask that you do not. I am still her protector."
"Where The Gray Goddess Dances"
"1章 灰の神子は何処に舞う"
